the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file
g.understand_that_APP_NAME_cannot_recover_: I understand that %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover lost passwords
g.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
g.password_must_be_characters_or_more: Password must be %(amount)s characters or more
g.need_password_or_key: You need a private password or key (not a public key)
g.account_name_should_start_with_a_letter: Account name should start with a letter.
g.account_name_should_have_only_letters_di: Account name should have only letters, digits, or dashes.
g.cannot_increase_reward_of_post_within_th: Cannot increase reward of post within the last minute before payout
g.vote_currently_exists_user_must_be_indic: vote currently exists, user must be indicate a desire to reject witness
g.only_one_APP_NAME_account_allowed_per_ip: Only one Steem account allowed per IP address every 10 minutes

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_DOMAIN)s if the account owner had perviously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun: Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using %(APP_NAME)s's blockchain-based multi factor authentication.
We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails.
Please be prepared to verify your identity.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.

Your phone number will not be used for any other purpose other than phone verification and account recovery.
createaccount_jsx.examples: Enter number without country code, for example: 541-754-3010 | 89-636-48018
createaccount_jsx.land_lines_cannot_receive_sms_messages: * Land lines cannot send or receive SMS messages
createaccount_jsx.message_and_data_rates_may_apply: * Message and data rates may apply

mobile_description.one: Right now, the registration on media-blockchain %(APP_NAME)s costs money for the system. In order for the community to grow quicker, we take those costs on board and pay out 5 %(APP_NAME)s tokens to each new member.
mobile_description.second: Unfortunately, people have started to take advantage of that and automated account registration had started to grow. Verification methods like: email checks, scripts or sending out a free sms verification, simply do not work. And cannot prove that the registry isn't a robot.
mobile_description.third: Accepting a paid sms from a user, is a good method to check out his motivation to register on the %(APP_NAME)s platform, also it is by far, more economically efficient for the whole system.
mobile_description.fourth: We are interested in real users (not bots) to register on our platform, hence, we kindly ask you to send out an sms to the stated number. It is no more than a human verification process. And works for the best of the whole community. Thank you!

createaccount_jsx.APP_NAME_wants_you_to_know: * Your mobile provider's standard rates for sending and receiving text messages still apply.

createaccount_jsx.you_can_change_your_number: You can change your number at any time if we didn't receive your sms with verification code.

converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: This is a price feed conversion. The 3.5 day delay is necessary to prevent abuse from gaming the price feed average
converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: Your existing %(DEBT_TOKEN)s are liquid and transferable. Instead you may wish to trade %(DEBT_TOKEN)s directly in this site under %(link)s or transfer to an external market.
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These %(DEBT_TOKEN)s will immediately become unavailable

user_profile_permissions.APP_NAME_is_a_social_media_platform_wher: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content

%(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.

tips_js.tradeable_tokens_that_may_be_transferred: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
tips_js.LIQUID_TOKEN_can_be_converted_to_VESTING: %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN2)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_tokens_which_give_you_more_con: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.the_more_you_hold_the_more_you_influence: The more you hold the more you influence post rewards and earn for accurate voting.
tips_js.the_estimated_value_is_based_on_an_avera: The estimated value is based on an average value of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s in US dollars.
tips_js.VESTING_TOKEN_is_non_transferrable_and_r: %(VESTING_TOKEN2)s is non-transferrable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
